Interprete¶

Analizador Léxico¶

Toma como entrada el codigo fuente del programa y devuelve un componente lexico a la vez.

lex.token¶

alias de Token

Analizador Sintáctico¶

This is an interface to Python’s internal parser.

parser.STType¶

alias de st

parser.compilest()¶

Compiles an ST object into a code object.

parser.expr()¶

Creates an ST object from an expression.

parser.isexpr()¶

Determines if an ST object was created from an expression.

parser.issuite()¶

Determines if an ST object was created from a suite.

parser.sequence2st()¶

Creates an ST object from a tree representation.

parser.st2list()¶

Creates a list-tree representation of an ST.

parser.st2tuple()¶

Creates a tuple-tree representation of an ST.

parser.suite()¶

Creates an ST object from a suite.

parser.tuple2st()¶

Creates an ST object from a tree representation.

tas.py¶

Tabla de Analisis Sintactico, implementada en un diccionario

tree.py¶

Definicion de la estructura principal del analizador sintactico

main.py¶
